value:
Bonus Legendary Heroes:

Including one of these Heroes
on your team will grant you the
following effects:
 - Highest score effect
 - Insurance effect when losing

Highest Score Effect:
Including a Bonus Legendary Hero
on your team allows you to face
the enemy teams with the highest
possible strength, allowing you to
earn the highest possible score.

Insurance Effect When Losing:
Including a Bonus Legendary Hero
on your team allows you to avoid
losing points if one of your units
is defeated. (When you lose units,
your score will be decreased as if
you lost one fewer units.)

Special Tier Conditions:
Tier will not drop in the event
of losses. (Tiers above the Tier
threshold may still decrease
during the reset before the
next event.)

Grants the ability to use Focus Charge
for Special Heroes.
